name: test_NAF_14_2_0_create_text_only_post
description:
Test Case: NAF-266
    As a user I want to create text or text + image posts to share with the community
    Scenario: Verify creating a text-only post
    
    Steps:
    1. Open the app, assume the user is logged in
    2. Go to "Community" tab
    3. Click "NEW POST" button
    4. Enter text content
    5. Click "Post" button
    6. Verify post is created successfully
    
    Expected Result: Text-only post should be created and visible in the community feed
descriptionHtml:
Test Case: NAF-266
As a user I want to create text or text + image posts to share with the community
Scenario: Verify creating a text-only post

Steps:
1. Open the app, assume the user is logged in
2. Go to "Community" tab
3. Click "NEW POST" button
4. Enter text content
5. Click "Post" button
6. Verify post is created successfully

Expected Result: Text-only post should be created and visible in the community feed

self = <test_14_Community.TestCommunityManagement object at 0x103571f50>
setup_and_teardown = <appium.webdriver.webdriver.WebDriver (session="08616c45-126c-4da4-b731-e7f185e0694c")>

    @allure.story("14.2.0 As a user I want to create text or text + image posts to share with the community")
    @allure.severity(allure.severity_level.BLOCKER)
    @allure.description("""
    Test Case: NAF-266
    As a user I want to create text or text + image posts to share with the community
    Scenario: Verify creating a text-only post
    
    Steps:
    1. Open the app, assume the user is logged in
    2. Go to "Community" tab
    3. Click "NEW POST" button
    4. Enter text content
    5. Click "Post" button
    6. Verify post is created successfully
    
    Expected Result: Text-only post should be created and visible in the community feed
    """)
    def test_NAF_14_2_0_create_text_only_post(self, setup_and_teardown):
        driver = setup_and_teardown
        community_page = CommunityPage(driver)
    
        # 1. Click NEW POST button
        assert community_page.click_new_post_button(), "NEW POST button not found"
        sleep(2)
    
        # 2. Verify we're on the new post page
        assert community_page.is_new_post_page(), "Did not enter NEW POST page"
    
        # 3. Generate unique post content
        post_text = 'Test text post ' + ''.join(random.choices(string.ascii_letters + string.digits, k=8))
        community_page.input_new_post_text(post_text)
        sleep(1)
    
        # 4. Click Post button
        community_page.click_post_button()
        logger.info(f"Successfully created text-only post: {post_text}")
    
        # 5. verify the success message
>       assert community_page.is_new_post_success_message_present(), "New post success message not found"
